info.description: This is the sipgate REST API documentation. We build our applications on this API and we invite you to use it too.
info.title: sipgate API

get.summary: List all restrictions based on the users product
get.description: Get restrictions for actions the authenticated user can perform for himself or another user.

get.summary: Get your incoming blacklist entries

post.summary: Create a new incoming blacklist entry

get.summary: Fetch the current automated call recording greeting

post.summary: save a greeting to be used for automated call recordings

delete.summary: delete the greeting used for automated call recordings

get.summary: Get the recording setting of a device

put.summary: Set the recording setting of a device

get.summary: List all calls currently established calls. The response does not contain ringing calls or currently running voicemail recordings.

post.summary: Start playing a new announcement to all participants
post.description: Currently the sound file needs to be a mono 16bit PCM WAV file with a sampling rate of 8kHz. MP3 conversion example: mpg123 --rate 8000 --mono -w output.wav input.mp3

post.summary: Send DTMF tone sequences to all participants

put.summary: Hold/Resume all participants
Mute/Unmute yourself
Start or stop a call recording

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter 'from' date time in ISO8601 format

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter 'to' date time in ISO8601 format

parameters.name: phonenumber
parameters.description: Filter events to or from given number

put.summary: Update multiple calls, faxes, SMS or voicemails

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A list of events which should be updated. Must be less than 150

delete.summary: Delete multiple calls, faxes, SMS or voicemails

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: List of entry ids to delete

get.summary: Get your webhooks log
List all phone numbers
get.description:
Possible portState->status codes:
100: Waiting for user fax
150: WBCI waiting for mail opt-in
160: WBCI opt-in hash generated
170: WBCI opt-in link clicked
200: Waiting for fax from current network operator
250: WBCI send
251: WBCI network error
252: WBCI EKP rejected
400: Porting accepted
450: Waiting for data exchange
451: Data exchange error
500: Porting complete
600: Porting cancelled

post.summary: Add a new quick dial number

get.summary: Check if quick dial number is already taken

delete.summary: Delete an existing quick dial number

parameters.name: numberId
parameters.description: The unique quick dial number identifier

put.summary: Update an existing quick dial number
Change phone number settings, e.g. route to endpoint

post.summary: Request a password change
Change the password

get.summary: List all phone number portings
get.description:
Possible status codes:
100: Waiting for user fax
150: WBCI waiting for mail opt-in
160: WBCI opt-in hash generated
170: WBCI opt-in link clicked
200: Waiting for fax from current network operator
250: WBCI send
251: WBCI network error
252: WBCI EKP rejected
400: Porting accepted
450: Waiting for data exchange
451: Data exchange error
500: Porting complete
600: Porting cancelled

get.summary: Get an existing porting

post.summary: Initiate a new call
post.description:
DeviceId is only required if the caller parameter is a phone number and not a deviceId itself.
Use callerId to set a custom number that will be displayed to the callee.

400.description:
User supplied invalid callee number
User supplied invalid caller number
DeviceId is required if caller is a phone number

403.description: User is not allowed to initiate call with given parameters

post.summary: Send a fax
Resend a faX
Initiate a new call to record an ivr message

400.description:
User supplied invalid callee number
User supplied invalid caller number
DeviceId is required if caller is a phone number

403.description: User is not allowed to initiate call with given parameters

post.summary: Send a text message
Initiate a new call to playback a voicemail

400.description:
User supplied invalid callee number
User supplied invalid caller number
DeviceId is required if caller is a phone number

403.description: User is not allowed to initiate call with given parameters

post.summary: Initiate a new call to record a greeting

get.summary: List all devices

post.summary: Create a new device
post.description: If you want to create a new register device the Restriction CAN_CREATE_REGISTER_DEVICE needs to be true for the specified userId.

post.summary: Create a new external device
post.description: If you want to create a new external device the Restriction CAN_CREATE_EXTERNAL_DEVICE needs to be true for the specified userId.

post.summary: Create a new mobile device
post.description: If you want to create a new mobile device the Restriction CAN_CREATE_MOBILE_DEVICE needs to be true for the specified userId.

post.summary: Create a new register device
post.description: If you want to create a new register device the Restriction CAN_CREATE_REGISTER_DEVICE needs to be true for the specified userId.

get.summary: List all OAuth 2.0 clients

post.summary: Create a new OAuth 2.0 client

name.description: Name of the application the client is intended to use with

description.description: Short description of the application the client is intended to use with

redirectUris.description: Valid URI pattern a browser can redirect to after a successful login or logout (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://example.com/*')

webOrigins.description: Allowed CORS origins (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://*.example.com')

Get all contacts

post.summary: Creates a contact
Import contacts from CSV file
post.description:
CSV files should match the following format:
firstname,lastname,number
Ada,Lovelace,+4915799912345
Alan,Turing,+4915799912345

post.summary: Import contacts from Google

put.summary: Updates a contact

get.summary: Check if API is reachable

url.description: The URL pointing to the announcement WAV file.

alias.example: Mobile phone phone of Grace Hopper

detail.example: It appears that you are not authorized to pass
detail.description: The detailed description of the error

pointer.description: A pointer to indicate where the error occured

ErrorSource.description: A more detailed info where the error occured

isBlock.description: Should phone numbers be blocked beginning with given number

name.description: Name of the application the client is intended to use with

description.description: Short description of the application the client is intended to use with

redirectUris.description: Valid URI pattern a browser can redirect to after a successful login or logout (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://example.com/*')

webOrigins.description: Allowed CORS origins (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://*.example.com')

phoneNumber.description: Participants phone number (can be empty for various reasons, e.g. anonymous participant)

xmlError.example: Response does not have content type application/xml

announcement.description: Announce recording start/stop to all participants

message.example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua.

attended.description: The transfer is attended or blind

scopes.sessions:write: Initiate calls, send faxes, send SMS
